pr_title: Add validator API to subscribe to attestation topics

timeline.message: Use interface for Eth2Network and introduce AttestationTopicSubscriptions to manage subscribing and unsubscribing from committees.
Implement validator API to subscribe to attestation topics.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into committee-subscriptions

timeline.bodyText: Is this due to potentially subscribing to the same topic for a later slot due to another aggregation duty?
timeline.author: cemozerr

replies.bodyText: Nvm, yeah it seems pretty clear.
replies.author: cemozerr

replies.bodyText: Yes. I think it's most likely to happen if we happen when one of the validators we run is aggregator for a committee in this epoch and another one (or the same one) is aggregator for that same committee next epoch.  You'd want to stay subscribed until the second one is reached.
replies.author: ajsutton
